description: An exploration ship from the Briss Kingdom in the South Blue that fell from the sky after being trapped in Skypiea for over 200 years. The ship contains evidence of Sky Islands including a map of Skypiea, making it crucial to the Straw Hats' next adventure.

keyEvents.title: St. Briss Falls from the Sky
keyEvents.description: The St. Briss, a massive galleon ship, plummets from the sky and crashes into the ocean near the Going Merry, providing the first physical proof of Sky Islands.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's dramatic appearance from the sky validates the Log Pose's strange behavior and becomes the catalyst for the Jaya Arc's central mystery.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Skypiea Map
keyEvents.description: Luffy discovers a map of Skypiea inside the St. Briss wreckage, providing the crew with concrete evidence and a name for the Sky Island.
keyEvents.significance: This discovery gives the crew their next destination and confirms the reality of Sky Islands.

keyEvents.title: Giant Sea Turtle Swallows St. Briss
keyEvents.description: A colossal sea turtle emerges and swallows the entire St. Briss wreck with people still inside, ending the ship's brief appearance.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's destruction by the sea turtle creates immediate danger and forces cooperation between the Straw Hats and Masira.

statusHistory.reason: Ship was active over 200 years ago when it sailed to Skypiea
Crew died after being trapped in sky for over 200 years via Cloud Drifting punishment
Completely destroyed when swallowed by giant sea turtle

description: The salvage vessel operated by Masira and his crew, the Masira Pirates. Equipped for underwater salvage operations to recover treasures and materials from shipwrecks in the Grand Line.

keyEvents.title: Masira's Ship Arrives
keyEvents.description: Masira's salvage ship arrives at the site of the St. Briss wreck, with Masira claiming ownership of all shipwrecks in the area.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of Masira's base of operations and his salvage crew. The ship represents Masira's livelihood as the Salvage King.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational and used for salvage operations

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel given to them by Kaya. In this episode, the Going Merry serves as the base from which the crew investigates the mysterious St. Briss.

keyEvents.title: Log Pose Points to Sky from Going Merry
keyEvents.description: While aboard the Going Merry, Nami discovers her Log Pose pointing straight up to the sky, beginning the mystery of Sky Islands.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry serves as the observation point for the Log Pose anomaly that kicks off the entire Sky Island Saga.
